original: intros K V U F FF H. intros [l isdiff]. split. - intros x limx. specialize (isdiff x limx) as [dom1 dom2]. unfold is_domin. intros P Q Ptrue Qtrue. apply (filter_and K U V FF P Q Ptrue Qtrue). apply dom1. apply dom2. - intros x. intros limx. specialize (isdiff x limx) as [dom1 dom2]. unfold is_domin in *. intros P Q disj. apply dom1. apply disj. apply dom2.
